title: Russia condemned over deadly Mariupol children's hospital bombing as WHO highlights pattern of strikes on medical facilities
content:
1. Russia condemned over deadly Mariupol children's hospital bombing as WHO highlights pattern of strikes on medical facilities  CNN
  2. Russia denies it bombed Ukrainian maternity hospital: 'fake news'  Fox News
  3. “Children buried under rubble” as Russian airstrike hits maternity hospital - BBC News  BBC News
  4. Russia bombed a maternity hospital – and the west has let them  The Independent
  5. Russia claims Mariupol hospital was militia base, gives no evidence  Business Insider
contentSnippet:
Russia condemned over deadly Mariupol children's hospital bombing as WHO highlights pattern of strikes on medical facilities  CNN
Russia denies it bombed Ukrainian maternity hospital: 'fake news'  Fox News

Russia bombed a maternity hospital – and the west has let them  The Independent
Russia claims Mariupol hospital was militia base, gives no evidence  Business Insider

localize.title: マリウポリ小児病院爆破事件でロシアを非難 WHOは医療施設に対する攻撃のパターンを強調
俄罗斯就马里乌波尔儿童医院被炸死一事进行谴责，世卫组织强调对医疗设施的袭击模式
俄羅斯就馬裏烏波爾兒童醫院被炸死一事進行譴責，世衛組織強調對醫療設施的襲擊模式
